content: The Astralink signpost is temporarily stored in Glenn's cargo box. Let's first discuss building the Astralink Station.
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>!
Welcome back!
Hope you had a safe journey and everything went well.
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Next, I will arrange the Astralink Station construction with Loomi Co. This is no conventional construction.
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Who? Let me think...{短暂停} Hohoho! It must have been Ms. Tuni, Glenn became a trainee coordinator thanks to her help.
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3

content:
Hoho~!
Under your leadership,
our Astralinks have truly become exceptional.
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Astralink legends say that the foundation of each Astralink Station is connected to the deepest part of the Bubble World. That is how anchor information remains stable and accurate.
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3

content: If you find these materials, no matter how many you have, feel free to come talk to me about "<color=#8AAB4B>our Astralink Station</color>" at any time.
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3

content: I didn't ask for your opinion ahead of time. While you were collecting the signpost, the neighbors came and asked about the Astralink Station. They wanted to be involved, too...
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3

content: So I assigned the interior decorations to everyone for brainstorming and preparing. Now we still need materials for the Station exterior...
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3

content: I hope you can help collect <color=#8AAB4B>6</color> pieces of <color=#8AAB4B>raw timber</color>, <color=#8AAB4B>5</color> pieces of <color=#8AAB4B>weathered wood</color>, and <color=#8AAB4B>3</color> pieces of <color=#8AAB4B>Old Temporal Fragment</color>.
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3

content: The other person knew you when I received the signpost.
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3

content: It went very well! They said we were exceptional.
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3

content: Hoho, for now, all we can do is provide materials for the Station's exterior and interior decoration... Ah, forgive me.
info: 了解建站条件-莫白_主流程文本3
